name: Scaffs
body:
# Scaffs - Standardised Folder Structures ### Available Scaffs * webapp * venture ## Webapp webapp/
├ dev/ (where you develop your app)
├ ├ api
├ ├ www
├ ├ admin
├ test/ (where you test your builds)
├ ├ api
├ ├ www
├ ├ admin
├ prod/ (where you run a version as close to production as possible)
├ ├ api
├ ├ www
├ ├ admin
├ grommets/ (your plugins)
├ cobbler/ (your tools)
└
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
